Mike Ziray introduces the Armory project and explains the architecture decisions behind building a full stack learning management app with JHipster - the same foundation and domain model as Learn With Hamster

Browser-based visual editor for designing JHipster Domain Language models. Build your entity diagram interactively and export the .jdl file used to generate all entities in both the gateway and service modules
Official step-by-step tutorial covering installation, running the generator for the first time, and understanding every configuration prompt for gateway and service module types

resource_name: Learn With Hamster - Full Source Code
resource_description: Complete source code for this application - a JHipster 8 microservices rebuild of the Armory project using Maven, Angular 19, Consul service discovery, HttpOnly cookie auth, and an earth-tone custom UI
Complete reference for the jhipster entity generator including DTO configuration, service layer options, pagination choices, and the difference between direct entity relationships and MapStruct DTOs

resource_name: Browse Module - Learn With Hamster Source
resource_description: The custom Angular browse module added to this project beyond the generated entity CRUD - shows standalone components, route configuration, and how to cleanly extend a JHipster Angular 19 application
Official guide to using Consul instead of JHipster Registry for microservice registration, health checks, and centralized Spring Cloud Config in a JHipster microservices application

resource_name: Liquibase Master Changelog - Learn With Hamster
resource_description: The root Liquibase migration file for the service module in this project - shows how generated changelogs, custom join table data, and seed CSVs are included and ordered for a JHipster app
Reference for JHipster security setup including JWT, cookie-based auth, CORS configuration, and how to extend SecurityConfiguration for custom permit-all routes and CSP headers

resource_name: Docker Compose Infrastructure - Learn With Hamster
resource_description: The root docker-compose.yml for this project defining Consul, two isolated MySQL instances, and Elasticsearch - the minimum infrastructure needed to run both JHipster modules locally in dev

Complete guide to testing a JHipster application including unit tests, integration tests with Testcontainers for real databases, Jest for Angular components, and Cypress for end-to-end browser testing

resource_name: JHipster Production Build and Deployment Guide
resource_description: How to build and deploy a JHipster application for production including Maven prod profile activation, Angular build optimization, Jib Docker image creation, and cloud deployment options

The original JHipster 4.x Armory learning management system by Mike Ziray that inspired this rebuild - same domain model and microservices architecture, useful for comparing JHipster 4 versus JHipster 8 generation
Complete tutorial series by Mike Ziray covering how to build the Armory learning management app from scratch with JHipster - the video foundation for this course's architecture and design decisions
